channel.title: How do you get people in your server?
channel.description: title says all how do you get people in your server?do you need a router?and if so is that the only way?

item.title: How do you get people in your server?
item.dc:creator: @The_007_Reaper The 007 Reaper
item.description:
@The_007_Reaper wrote:

Gign is correct, you need yourself a router or a wireless connection then make your PORTS forward which is simple, but if not taken and looked at carfully could possible DESTROY your entire internet so if your planning on doing it, be very carfull and attentive. And i’d recommend you download a server source for quickness, although you dont learn as much.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get people in your server?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

look in the TUT’s section before you post this

there are like 3 great TUTs on how to portforward and host your server

a router would be the safest and easiest way

God of Ikiliki has a TUT on it

his compiler path thing only has up to jdk 6.2

just change the 2’s to 3’s

if you downloaded 3

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get people in your server?

item.title: How do you get people in your server?
item.dc:creator: @gign919191 gign919191
item.description:
@gign919191 wrote:

Just, get a wireless connection, (modem+router) and do portforward.

Then, dowload a server source OR make urself one from scratch (TAKES LOOONG TIME)

Then, hit runserver.

You’re done!

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get people in your server?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:8, topic:161043”]Erm, i thought that if you did’nt have a router you would have no internet connection…Must be me.

IfYou have no router, download hamaci and set it up that way (not reccomended) Because hamachi lags, when they say it doesent, and mostly lets people add more trogans (not much safety)[/quote]

Router, Modem, Wireless USB.
